'''''Ringers: Lord of the Fans''''' is a [[2005]] film about the culture and fans behind ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' and [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]'s works.

==Reception==
The film received mixed reviews, generally disliked by fans of J.R.R. Tolkien{{Citation needed}} and praised by fans of [[Peter Jackson]]'s [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]].{{Citation needed}} It is currently rated 6.2/10 on IMDB.
